actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 6:30 p.m. on January 9, 2024.
Pursuant to section 3 of H. Res. 922, the Chair announced that no organizational or legislative business will be conducted on this day.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Robert J. Wittman to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
